Class Restock

java.lang.Object
Restock
public class Restock extends Object
This class acts as a restock record, giving information about the inventory ID, product name, current amount of stock for a specific inventory item, quantity of said inventory item used in one day, and a recommendation for whether a restock should be considered or not
